meanings.meaning_en_US: A room or building for displaying art.

examples.sentence: We visited the art [gallery] downtown.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們參觀了市中心的藝術畫廊

examples.sentence: The [gallery] displayed a collection of modern art.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 畫廊展出了現代藝術的收藏

examples.sentence: She works at a local [gallery].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她在當地的畫廊工作

meanings.meaning_en_US: To record information or enroll formally.

examples.sentence: Please [register] for the event online.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 請在線上註冊參加活動。

examples.sentence: I will [register] my name for the conference.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我將為會議註冊我的名字。

examples.sentence: He forgot to [register] for the class.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他忘了為這門課註冊。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Information or criticism about an action or performance.

examples.sentence: The teacher gave the student [feedback] on their essay.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 老師給學生的文章提供了反饋。

examples.sentence: Receiving [feedback] can help improve future performance.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 獲得反饋可以幫助改善未來的表現。

examples.sentence: Customer [feedback] is crucial for our product development.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 顧客的反饋對我們的產品開發至關重要。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To express an opinion or reaction to something.

examples.sentence: Please [comment] on the proposal during the meeting.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 請在會議中對提案評論

examples.sentence: He always has something to [comment] on the news.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他總是對新聞有一些評論

examples.sentence: I would like to [comment] about your performance.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我想對你的表現做出評論

meanings.meaning_en_US: Relating to the management of large amounts of money, especially by governments or large organizations.

examples.sentence: They offer [financial] advice for investments.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們提供投資方面的金融建議

examples.sentence: She has a [financial] background in accounting.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她有會計方面的金融背景

examples.sentence: The government announced new [financial] regulations.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 政府宣布了新的金融法規

meanings.meaning_en_US: The necessary items for a particular purpose.

examples.sentence: We need to purchase new [equipment] for the lab.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們需要為實驗室購買新設備。

examples.sentence: The gym has all the modern [equipment].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 健身房擁有所有現代設備。

examples.sentence: Safety [equipment] is mandatory in construction sites.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 施工現場必須配備安全設備。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The relative social, professional, or other standing of someone or something.

examples.sentence: His financial [status] improved significantly over the years.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他的財務狀況在這些年中顯著改善。

examples.sentence: She worked hard to elevate her social [status].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她努力提高自己的社會地位。

examples.sentence: The project is still in a beta [status].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 該專案仍處於測試階段。

meanings.meaning_en_US: An important topic or problem for debate or discussion.

examples.sentence: The meeting will address the budget [issue].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 會議將討論預算問題

examples.sentence: Climate change is a pressing [issue] that needs attention.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 氣候變化是一個需要關注的緊迫議題

examples.sentence: There has been a lot of [issue] regarding the new law.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 有關新法律的問題引起了很多討論

meanings.meaning_en_US: To distribute or circulate something, especially information.

examples.sentence: The organization will [issue] a statement tomorrow.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 該機構將於明天發出聲明

examples.sentence: They decided to [issue] new guidelines for the program.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們決定為該計畫發佈新的指導方針

examples.sentence: The bank will [issue] new credit cards next month.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 該銀行將於下個月發出新信用卡

meanings.meaning_en_US: A machine for transmitting written documents or images via a telephone line.

examples.sentence: Please send the documents via [fax].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 請通過傳真發送文件。

examples.sentence: The office relies on a [fax] for communication.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這辦公室依賴傳真進行通信。

examples.sentence: I’ll [fax] you the information shortly.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我會很快把資料傳真給你。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Relating to or connected with a profession.

examples.sentence: She is a [professional] dancer.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她是一位專業的舞者

examples.sentence: His look was very [professional] in the suit.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他穿著西裝看起來非常專業

examples.sentence: They offered [professional] advice about the project.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們提供了專業的項目建議

meanings.meaning_en_US: A person engaged or qualified in a profession.

examples.sentence: He is a [professional] in IT services.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他是資訊科技服務的專業人士

examples.sentence: The event was hosted by several [professionals].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這個活動由幾位專業人士主持

examples.sentence: The company seeks to hire more [professionals] for its team.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這家公司希望招聘更多專業人士加入團隊

meanings.meaning_en_US: The action of mentioning or alluding to something.

examples.sentence: Her PhD paper includes many [references] from recent research.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她的博士論文包含許多來自近期研究的參考文獻。

examples.sentence: The [reference] section of the book is very helpful.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這本書的參考文獻部分非常有幫助。

examples.sentence: He made several [references] to famous authors.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他對著名作家做了幾處引用。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A group of people convened for advice or decision-making.

examples.sentence: The city [council] meets every month to discuss local issues.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 市議會每個月會面對面討論地方問題。

examples.sentence: She was elected to the student [council] last year.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她去年當選為學生會成員。

examples.sentence: The advisory [council] provided insights on the new policy.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 顧問委員會就新政策提供了洞察。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Activities that provide amusement or enjoyment.

examples.sentence: The movie was a great source of [entertainment].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這部電影是個很好的娛樂來源。

examples.sentence: There are many forms of [entertainment] available online.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 線上有許多娛樂形式可供選擇。

examples.sentence: He seeks [entertainment] in music and art.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他在音樂和藝術中尋找娛樂。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The branch of science and technology concerned with the design and applications of devices and circuits.

examples.sentence: He studied [electronics] at college.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他在大學學習電子學。

examples.sentence: Advancements in [electronics] have changed our lives.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 電子學的進步改變了我們的生活。

examples.sentence: This course focuses on [electronics] and circuit design.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這門課程專注於電子學和電路設計。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A formal meeting for discussion.

examples.sentence: The annual [conference] attracted many participants.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 年度會議吸引了很多參與者

examples.sentence: She will present her research at the [conference].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她將在會議上介紹她的研究

examples.sentence: They held a [conference] to discuss the future of the project.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們舉行了會議以討論項目的未來

meanings.meaning_en_US: An area of a country or city that is defined by particular characteristics.

examples.sentence: She lives in a quiet suburban [district].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她住在一個安靜的郊區。

examples.sentence: The school is in a different [district] from the one we checked.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這所學校位於我們查看的不同地區。

examples.sentence: Each electoral [district] elects one representative.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 每個選舉區都選出一位代表。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The management of large amounts of money, especially by governments or large companies.

examples.sentence: He studied [finance] at the university.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他在大學學習財務管理

examples.sentence: Finance is crucial for business success.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 財務對企業成功至關重要

examples.sentence: She works in [finance] for a multinational corporation.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她在一家跨國公司從事財務工作

meanings.meaning_en_US: one part in every hundred.

examples.sentence: He scored eighty [percent] on the test.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他在測試中得了百分之八十。

examples.sentence: The price was reduced by ten [percent].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 價格降低了百分之十。

examples.sentence: They gained a five [percent] increase in sales.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們的銷售額增長了百分之五。
